summary: Weatherford is a city in Parker County, Texas near Fort Worth.
full_text:
Weatherford is a city in Parker County, Texas, United States. The population was 25,250 at the 2010 census. It is the county seat of Parker County and is part of the Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex.
^ "American FactFinder". United States Census Bureau. Retrieved 2008-01-31. 
^ "US Board on Geographic Names". United States Geological Survey. 2007-10-25. Retrieved 2008-01-31. 
^ "Find a County". National Association of Counties. Retrieved 2011-06-07.
title: Weatherford, Texas
